job.title: C++ Developer
job.description: Job Title : Software Engineer C++<br>Location: Salt Lake City , UT<br>Job Type: Contract<br><br>Job Description <br>Software Engineer -C++ Linux . Experience in Python, Shell scripting. Nice to have experience in Java, GWT, and QT. <br><br>Roles & Responsibilities: <br>Participate in requirement analysis, design, coding, and testing (manual as well as automation) <br>Ability to understand/learn architecture and design of existing applications developed mainly using C++ <br>Take ownership of assigned jobs that are part of new feature implementation, bugfixes and enhancement activities <br>Technical communication with internal/external stake holders and collaboration with global team will be part of job. <br><br>Required Skills (Technical Competency): <br>3-5 years of experience in design and development of C++ software applications and frameworks in Windows /Linux. <br>Experience in requirement analysis, design development, coding, code review and unit testing. <br>Hands on software development experience – strong C++ programming skills. <br>Experience in Object Oriented design and multi-threading methodologies. <br>Experience analysing, debugging issues with multi-threaded process using debugger <br>Ability to write effective and reusable code according to best practices <br>Experience inworking with Agile methodology in project execution <br><br>Desired Skills: <br>Experience in Python, Shell scripting. <br>Nice to have experience in Java, GWT, and QT. <br>Familiar with Healthcare domain standard like DICOM and IHE. <br>Ability to explore large code base and understand architecture and design <br>Ability to deliver without much supervision from lead/managers <br>Familiar with tools like WinSCP, Eclipse, Putty, Rally, Collaborator, SVN, Git <br><br>If you are interested kindly apply through the below link:<br>https://bit.ly/3wCDEba<br><br>Recruiter Details:<br>Mohamed sheik<br>(302) 310-5458<br>sheikmd_us@falconsmartit.com<br><br>Find all current job openings at our Career Page<br>https://www.falconsmartit.com/FalconCareer.html<br><br>Follow us on LinkedIn for Job Opportunities<br>https://www.linkedin.com/company/falconsmartit/
